data.eml:eml: New species of Trichomycterus (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae) from the High Andean Plateau of Argentina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernández, Luis, Bize, Julieta Andreoli (2018): New species of Trichomycterus (Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae) from the High Andean Plateau of Argentina. Zootaxa 4504 (3): 359-370, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4504.3.3
